channel.title: Adding custom items
channel.description: hey, im new to coding and was wondering how to add dragon claws and the dragon claw spec to my 317 server. thanks.

item.title: Adding custom items
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

In the renamed client, adding animations can be done in the Animation class, and adding items can be done in the ItemDef class.
In the non-renamed client, adding animations can be done in the Class20 class, and adding items can be done in the Class8 class.

Iâ€™ll do you a favour this one time, and help you add Dclaws + the spec.

For renamed:

In the ItemDef class, add:

if(i == IDOFCLAWSHERE) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 44590; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 43660;//anInt165 itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 43600;//anInt200 itemDef.modelZoom = 789; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 240; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 60; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -23; itemDef.name = "Dragon claws"; itemDef.description = "A set of fighting claws.".getBytes(); }

For non-renamed:

if(i == IDOFCLAWSHERE) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 44590; class8.anInt165 = 43660;//anInt165 class8.anInt200 = 43600;//anInt200 class8.anInt181 = 789; class8.anInt190 = 240; class8.anInt198 = 60; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -23; class8.aString170 = "Dragon claws"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A set of fighting claws.".getBytes(); }

Models:

MediaFire

dclaws.zip

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.

The animation.

The Animation class:

For renamed:

if(j == IDOFEMOTEHERE){ int file = 1686; if(FrameStart[file] < 1) Class36.methodCustomAnimations(false, file); int[] frames = {75,75 ,62,62,93,93,93,82,82,57,57,71,71,66,66,66,61,92,73,73, 65,65,89,89,70,70,81,81,67,67,67,84,59,63,63,99,99,78,69,69,96,96,74,74,74 ,79,90,90,94,94,58,0}; anims[j].anInt352 = frames.length-1; anims[j].anIntArray353 = new int[frames.length-1]; anims[j]..anIntArray354 = new int[frames.length-1]; anims[j].anIntArray355 = new int[frames.length-1]; anims[j].anInt363 = 0; anims[j].anInt364 = 0; for(int i2 = 0; i2 < frames.length-1; i2++){ anims[j].anIntArray353[i2] = frames[i2] + FrameStart[file]; anims[j].anIntArray354[i2] = -1; anims[j].anIntArray355[i2] = 2; } }

For non-renamed:

if(j == IDOFEMOTE){ int file = 1686; Class20 class20 = aClass20Array351[j]; if(FrameStart[file] < 1) Class36.methodCustomAnimations(false, file); int[] framez = {75,75,62,62,93,93,93,82,82,57,57,71,71,66,66,66,61,92,73,73,65,65,89,89,70,70,81,81,67,67,67,84,59,63,63,99,99,78,69,69,96,96,74,74,74,79,90,90,94,94,58,0}; class20.anInt352 = frames.length-1; class20.anIntArray353 = new int[framez.length-1]; class20.anIntArray354 = new int[framez.length-1]; class20.anIntArray355 = new int[framez.length-1]; class20.anInt363 = 0; class20.anInt364 = 0; for(int i2 = 0; i2 < framez.length-1; i2++){ class20.anIntArray353[i2] = framez[i2]; class20.anIntArray354[i2] = -1; class20.anIntArray355[i2] = 2; //Decrease this if you want to speed it up } }

The file you need: http://uppit.com/v/2LBO083C

Read full topic
